downloadTitle: Managing and deploying apps in Microsoft Teams
downloadDescription: Learn how to manage and deploy apps in Microsoft Teams
detailsSection: The use of apps for Microsoft Teams can be challenging for the IT Team, as there is a need to address many different topics (Security, Compliance, Access Permissions, Connectivity, others) and this can involve several teams. This presentation was developed to support your organization in accelerating the deployment and management of applications for Microsoft Teams by walking through how to define a formal process for Apps for Microsoft Teams for your organization. This presentation also shares an overview of the process developed by Microsoft’s IT Team to evaluate, authorize, deploy and manage third-party applications for Microsoft Teams for their employees.
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file or find the file on your device and open it.
